text: Spanish North Africa may refer to: *Contemporary Spanish North Africa: **Spain's two autonomous cities: Ceuta and Melilla, plus other minor territories (plazas de soberanía) **The Canary Islands *Historical Spanish North Africa (1913–1975); former Spanish colonies in Northern Africa, part of the Plazas y Provincias Africanas: **Spanish Morocco **Spanish Sahara **Ifni **Cape Juby ==See also== *Spanish Africa (disambiguation) *Spanish West Africa *Ceuta and Melilla (disambiguation) *Languages of Africa
title: Spanish North Africa
